positions.description: At the Supreme Court of Ohio I assisted Sara Andrews, Executive Director of the Ohio Criminal Sentencing Commission, by creating a brochure that marketed the organization and profiled its members. As well as, reviewing Ohio Court documents to ensure compliance with Federal Supreme Courts Legalization of Same-Sex Marriage. I also analyzed the Ohio Department of Rehabilitation and Corrections 2015 budget by county and program to format the data into user-friendly charts and graphs.
